description: Number of reversible strings with n beads using a maximum of six different colors.
comments: A string and its reverse are considered to be equivalent. Thus aabc and cbaa are considered to be identical, but abca is a different string.
references: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (6,6,-36).
author: Marks R. Nester (nesterm(AT)dpi.qld.gov.au)
